pre_questionnaire.Agent10:
Okay, pal, let's get right to it.

Q1: 8
Q2: 2
Q3: 3
Q4: 7

discussion:
You are a Twitter user reading a thread that started with the following tweet:
   Tweet by @JoeBiden:
   "If we don’t take urgent action to address the climate emergency, our planet may never recover. We must get the climate change denier out of the White House and tackle this crisis head-on."
   Consider and respond to the full context of the conversation. Avoid repetition; introduce new angles or synthesize previous ideas.
   You may tag @JoeBiden and/or the users <name>: you are replying to.
   Stay under 280 characters per message. Every time you respond, start with <name>:.
Agent0: @JoeBiden "Climate emergency"? More like a climate cash grab! My tax dollars are being funneled into this hoax. Do some real research before pushing this agenda. #ClimateScam #FakeNews

Agent1: @JoeBiden @Agent0 The climate alarmists are at it again! Biden's plan will kill jobs and cripple our economy. We need energy independence, not more government control! #MAGA #EnergyIndependence

Agent2: @Agent1 Seriously? Ignoring the climate crisis is what's crippling our future. We need leaders who listen to scientists, not fossil fuel lobbyists. @JoeBiden, keep fighting for our planet! #ClimateActionNow

Agent3: @Agent2 "Listen to scientists"? The same ones who keep changing their predictions? This whole thing is a political power play. @JoeBiden, how about some accountability for these empty promises? #ClimateHysteria #ShowMeTheData

Agent4: @Agent3 Show me the verifiable data supporting the "climate emergency" claims. Where's the transparent cost-benefit analysis of these policies? We need concrete evidence, not fear-mongering. #ClimateDebate #Transparency

Agent5: @Agent4 The evidence is overwhelming. Look at the increasing frequency of extreme weather events & rising sea levels. Ignoring the science is reckless. We're facing a potential mass extinction. @JoeBiden needs to push for bold action. #ClimateEmergency #ActOnClimate

Agent6: @Agent5 Mass extinction? Hyperbole much? @JoeBiden's "bold action" will bankrupt us. The climate changes, always has. Let's focus on REAL problems, like the border crisis THEY created. #WakeUpAmerica #LiberalAgenda

Agent7: @Agent6 Border crisis is a real problem. @JoeBiden's climate policies will kill American jobs and send them overseas. Who benefits from this green new deal anyway? #AmericaFirst #EnergySecurity
Agent8: @Agent6 Exactly! Climate change is a convenient excuse for the left to push their socialist agenda. @JoeBiden focuses on this while our country falls apart. #AmericaFirst #DrainTheSwamp

Agent9: @Agent5 The science IS clear. Ignoring it is criminal. We need REAL leadership, not excuses. @JoeBiden, we're counting on you to fight for our future. This is our only planet. #ClimateEmergency #ActOnClimateNOW

Agent10: @Agent7 Jobs overseas? Please. Biden's "green" dreams are a nightmare for the American worker. #EnergySecurity #AmericaFirst

Agent10: @Agent9 "Criminal"? Give me a break. Let's not bankrupt the country chasing windmills. Common sense, people! #ClimateDebate

Agent10: @Agent2 Fossil fuel lobbyists aren't the enemy, they provide affordable energy. Let's focus on innovation, not regulation. #EnergyIndependence

Agent10: @Agent5 "Extreme weather"? Always happened. And those batteries & solar panels? Ask about the mining & disposal costs. #ClimateReality

Agent10: @Agent7 "Green New Deal" = higher taxes & less freedom. Seems like a raw deal for most Americans. #AmericaFirst #CommonSense
Agent10: @JoeBiden "Urgent action" = higher gas prices & more control for DC elites. I'll pass. #ClimateScam #MAGA
